Sentencas: In this work, morphological changes that patterned nickel films undergo during operations under both solid oxide fuel cell and solid oxide electrolysis modes are investigated using patterned nickel film electrodes.
Titulo: Influence of Polarization on the Morphological Changes of Nickel in Fuel Electrodes of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Based on ex situ scanning electron microscope observations, it is found that local morphological changes of nickel at active three-phase-boundaries are influenced by polarization during operations.
Titulo: Influence of Polarization on the Morphological Changes of Nickel in Fuel Electrodes of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Under fuel cell mode,the phenomenon of discontinuous nickel spreading caused by the co-effect of enhanced nickel wettability on yttria-stabilized zirconia and nickel coarsening is responsible for the complex morphological changes of patterned nickel film.
Titulo: Influence of Polarization on the Morphological Changes of Nickel in Fuel Electrodes of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: Under electrolysis mode, the delamination of nickel from the yttria-stabilized zirconia is observed, which is attributed to the weakened nickel wettability on yttria-stabilized zirconia.
Titulo: Influence of Polarization on the Morphological Changes of Nickel in Fuel Electrodes of Solid Oxide Cells

Sentencas: The phenomena observed during different operations are explained by correlating the nickel wettability on yttria-stabilized zirconia to the level of adsorbed oxygen on the nickel surface, as inferred from the changes in both nickel surface tension and work of adhesion at the nickel-yttria-stabilized zirconia interface.
Titulo: Influence of Polarization on the Morphological Changes of Nickel in Fuel Electrodes of Solid Oxide Cells
